caption: Dusk settled in a forest where two men were engaged in a conversation. One of them was passionately trying to persuade the other, speaking with fervor.In another location, on a desolate desert, a group of people was taking a break. Among them was a man and some indigenous people, all looking fatigued as they leaned against rocks. Suddenly, a horse galloped in, and they opened a package on the horse to find a skull. Their reactions were filled with grief, with one disheveled woman cradling the skull and crying inconsolably.Inside a cabin, a man and a woman conversed without wearing clothes. The man was speaking to the woman, who appeared to admire him deeply.
